synopsis:
1st year work 2015, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

Director：Xueqing SHAO
Music :Tatsuki TSUSHIMA
Sound Design：Hiraku SOMENO
producer : Koji YAMAMURA

Synopsis：
Various visions of life and death, as seen from an operation table. Did the operation succeed ? Is the patient still alive ?
